intro: Sarcinanthus utilis, commonly known as the useful sarcinanthus, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its showy, tubular flowers that range in color from red to purple. Due to its ornamental value and medicinal properties, it is sometimes cultivated in gardens.
